Sentencas: Strontium titanate is a perovskite with a great potential to act as an anode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials

Sentencas: The requirements for these materials concern not only electrical but also microstructural properties.
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials

Sentencas: The strontium titanate with regular pore structure can exhibit lower flow resistance compared to random pore distributed materials.
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials

Sentencas: Several methods of synthesis (with addition of various organic agents) allowed obtaining materials with regular/irregular pore structure.
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials

Sentencas: Regardless of synthesis methods all materials showed high porosity (above 40 vol.%).
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials

Sentencas: Additionally it was found that three dimensionally ordered macroporous structure collapsed after sintering at 1200 degrees C whereas macro-mesoporous structure of P-123 modified strontium titanate had persisted.
Titulo: Synthesis of Highly Porous SrTiO3 Materials
